internal_communications.template:
LUKE LAPPALA
Seattle, WA
(555) 123-4567
luke.lappala@example.com
linkedin.com/in/lukelappala

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Experienced internal communications professional with a proven track record in developing and executing strategic employee engagement initiatives. Skilled in fostering organizational culture, managing change communications, and building strong relationships with stakeholders at all levels. Demonstrated expertise in creating impactful internal content and driving employee engagement through effective communication strategies.

AREAS OF EXPERTISE
• Internal Communications Strategy
• Employee Engagement
• Change Management
• Leadership Communications
• Content Strategy
• Project Management
• Stakeholder Management
• Executive Communications
• Digital Workplace Tools
• Corporate Culture Building

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

Senior Internal Communications Manager | Current Company | January 2020 - Present
• Led internal communications strategy development and execution for organization-wide initiatives
• Managed change communication programs reaching 5,000+ employees across multiple locations
• Developed and implemented measurement frameworks to track communication effectiveness
• Partnered with executive leadership to craft and deliver key messages to employees
• Created and maintained crisis communication plans and protocols

Internal Communications Specialist | Previous Company | March 2017 - December 2019
• Developed and executed communication plans for major organizational changes
• Created engaging content for multiple internal channels including intranet and newsletters
• Supported executive communications including speeches, presentations, and town halls
• Implemented new digital communication tools to enhance employee engagement
• Managed internal social media platforms and engagement initiatives

Communications Coordinator | First Company | June 2015 - February 2017
• Assisted in developing and implementing internal communication strategies
• Created content for various internal channels including newsletters and intranet
• Supported change management initiatives through effective communication
• Coordinated town halls and other employee engagement events
• Maintained communication calendars and tracked metrics

EDUCATION
Bachelor of Arts in Communications | University of Washington | June 2015

CERTIFICATIONS
• Professional Communication Management (PCM)
• Change Management Practitioner (PROSCI)
• Digital Communication Strategy (DCS)

external_communications.template:
LUKE LAPPALA
Seattle, WA
(555) 123-4567
luke.lappala@example.com
linkedin.com/in/lukelappala

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Strategic communications professional with extensive experience in public relations, media relations, and brand management. Proven track record of developing and executing successful external communication campaigns that enhance brand visibility and reputation. Skilled in crisis communications, stakeholder engagement, and creating compelling narratives that resonate with diverse audiences.

AREAS OF EXPERTISE
• Public Relations Strategy
• Media Relations
• Brand Management
• Crisis Communications
• Content Development
• Social Media Strategy
• Press Release Writing
• Stakeholder Relations
• Campaign Management
• Event Planning

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

Senior Communications Manager | Current Company | January 2020 - Present
• Developed and executed comprehensive PR strategies aligned with business objectives
• Managed media relations and secured coverage in top-tier publications
• Led crisis communications response team and developed crisis management protocols
• Created and maintained relationships with key media contacts and industry influencers
• Oversaw social media strategy and content development across all platforms

Public Relations Specialist | Previous Company | March 2017 - December 2019
• Executed PR campaigns resulting in increased brand visibility and positive media coverage
• Wrote and distributed press releases, media advisories, and other communications materials
• Managed company's social media presence and grew follower base by 200%
• Coordinated press events and media interviews for executive leadership
• Developed and maintained crisis communication plans

Communications Coordinator | First Company | June 2015 - February 2017
• Assisted in implementing PR strategies and media relations initiatives
• Created content for external communications channels and social media
• Supported event planning and execution for media and stakeholder events
• Monitored media coverage and prepared daily news summaries
• Maintained media contact database and coverage tracking systems

EDUCATION
Bachelor of Arts in Communications | University of Washington | June 2015

CERTIFICATIONS
• Accredited in Public Relations (APR)
• Digital Marketing Professional (DMP)
• Social Media Management (SMM)

cover_letter.template:
[NAME]
[EMAIL]
Seattle, WA

Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my strong interest in the [JOB_TITLE] position at [COMPANY_NAME]. With my extensive background in communications and proven track record of developing and executing strategic initiatives, I am confident in my ability to contribute significantly to your organization.

Throughout my career, I have demonstrated expertise in [REQUIREMENTS], which align perfectly with the qualifications you are seeking. My key accomplishments include:

[SKILLS]

I am particularly drawn to [COMPANY_NAME]'s commitment to excellence and believe my experience and skills would make me a valuable addition to your team. I am excited about the opportunity to bring my expertise in strategic communications and stakeholder engagement to support your organization's goals.

I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my background and skills would benefit [COMPANY_NAME]. Thank you for considering my application.

Best regards,
Luke Lappala
